_comment: Claude Code hooks - run commands before/after tool calls
_usage: Copy relevant sections to your settings.json or settings.local.json

hooks._comment: === EXAMPLES - Uncomment and customize what you need ===

_post:Write._comment: Lint files after Claude writes them

_pre:Bash(npm test)._comment: Ensure dependencies are installed before testing

_post:Task._comment: Notify when a long task completes (macOS example)
_post:Task.command: osascript -e 'display notification "Task completed" with title "Claude Code"'

_variables.{{file_path}}: Path of the file being written/edited
_variables.{{tool_name}}: Name of the tool being executed
_variables.{{exit_code}}: Exit code of the previous command (post hooks only)
